00188 template <class AdaptableUnaryFunction, class Iterator, class Reference = use_default, class Value = use_default>
00189   class transform_iterator
00190     : public detail::transform_iterator_base<AdaptableUnaryFunction, Iterator, Reference, Value>::type
00191 {
00194   public:
00195     typedef typename
00196     detail::transform_iterator_base<AdaptableUnaryFunction, Iterator, Reference, Value>::type
00197     super_t;
00198 
00199     friend class experimental::iterator_core_access;
00203   public:
00206     __host__ __device__
00207     transform_iterator() {}
00208   
00215     __host__ __device__
00216     transform_iterator(Iterator const& x, AdaptableUnaryFunction f)
00217       : super_t(x), m_f(f) {
00218     }
00219   
00225     __host__ __device__
00226     explicit transform_iterator(Iterator const& x)
00227       : super_t(x) { }
00228 
00234     template<typename OtherAdaptableUnaryFunction,
00235              typename OtherIterator,
00236              typename OtherReference,
00237              typename OtherValue>
00238     __host__ __device__
00239     transform_iterator(const transform_iterator<OtherAdaptableUnaryFunction, OtherIterator, OtherReference, OtherValue> &other,
00240                        typename thrust::detail::enable_if_convertible<OtherIterator, Iterator>::type* = 0,
00241                        typename thrust::detail::enable_if_convertible<OtherAdaptableUnaryFunction, AdaptableUnaryFunction>::type* = 0)
00242       : super_t(other.base()), m_f(other.functor()) {}
00243 
00247     __host__ __device__
00248     AdaptableUnaryFunction functor() const
00249       { return m_f; }
00250 
00253   private:
00254     typename super_t::reference dereference() const
00255     { 
00256       return m_f(*this->base());
00257     }
00258 
00259     // tag this as mutable per Dave Abrahams in this thread:
00260     // http://lists.boost.org/Archives/boost/2004/05/65332.php
00261     mutable AdaptableUnaryFunction m_f;
00262 
00265 }; // end transform_iterator

00279 template <class AdaptableUnaryFunction, class Iterator>
00280 inline __host__ __device__
00281 transform_iterator<AdaptableUnaryFunction, Iterator>
00282 make_transform_iterator(Iterator it, AdaptableUnaryFunction fun)
00283 {
00284   return transform_iterator<AdaptableUnaryFunction, Iterator>(it, fun);
00285 } // end make_transform_iterator
